Messages.Author: Gabriele Böhm
Messages.Content: Liebe Studierende,  Sie können sich in MOSES zur  Modulprüfung "PIV Hochbau I Belgienhalle - Early Industrial Architecture in Berlin unter der MOSES-Nr. 61345 anmelden.  Mit freundlichen Grüßen  Gabriele Böhm Sekretariat Bau- und Stadtbaugeschichte

Messages.Author: Gabriele Böhm
Messages.Content: Liebe Studierende,  die Prüfungsanmeldung ist in MOSES eröffnet, bitte melden Sie sich an.  Mit freundlichen Grüßen  Gabriele Böhm Sekretariat Bau- und Stadtbaugeschichte

Messages.Author: Ursula Quatember
Messages.Content: Dear participants in the seminar on the "Belgienhalle", Your course is now open for evaluation until July 14, 2024. I'll be very happy to get some constructive feedback. Attached you will find the link, which will also be posted on ISIS. An English version of the survey is available. https://befragung.tu-berlin.de/evasys/online.php?p=WVEU8 Thanks a lot in advance for your participation. Best wishes, Ursula Quatember

Messages.Author: Ursula Quatember
Messages.Content: Dear participants in the PiV Belgienhalle, As Liang Song has informed you yesterday, I could not come to our PiV seminar due to the delay of my night train from Vienna to Berlin of over 500 (!) minutes. The locomotive broke down, and instead of waking up shortly before Berlin, I woke up in the train station of a tiny Czech village, where we had to wait (without electricity and internet) until another locomotive came and we could continue our journey... Traveling is always some kind of adventure, I guess. I have adjusted our schedule. You will find it attached here, and you can also find it again on ISIS. See you again next week! Best wishes, Ursula Quatember

Messages.Author: Ursula Quatember
Messages.Content: Dear all, The guest lecture of Antonia Brauchle, "Repurposing Industrial Buildings – Case Studies from Berlin-Oberschöneweide" will be presented next Monday, June 10 in our seminar (14:00, Room 201A). The presentations originally scheduled for this date will be postponed. We will talk about the new schedule on Monday. Best wishes, Ursula Quatember

Messages.Author: Ursula Quatember
Messages.Content: Dear students, Unfortunately I have gotten sick and have to cancel our class on Monday, June 3, 2024. Best wishes, Ursula Quatember
